text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,The full name of Jehovah the Son is now ‘The Lord Jesus Christ’. Where ‘Lord’ occurs without the definite article or a possessive pronoun I often render ‘Sovereign’. who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly realms“In the heavenly realms” appears to be a synonym for Heaven; the blessings are there, ready to be distributed. in Christ;The blessings are only for those who are in Christ. Unbelievers may receive some spinoff benefits.
